definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: † [[הֵ֫מָּה]] and [[הֵם]] (without appreciable distinction in usage, except prob. in so far as the longer or shorter from was better adapted to the rhythm of particular sentences: on the whole [[הֵמָּה]] (alone) is somewhat more freq. than [[הֵם]], [[הָהֵם]] on the contrary is said regularly, [[הָהֵמָּה]] occurring only 12 t., viz. Nu 9:7 (P), Je 14:15, Zec 14:15, and in the phr. [[מִָים הָהֵמָּה]]([[הַ]])[[בַּ]] 2Ki 18:4, Je 3:16, Je 3:18, Je 5:18; Je 50:4, Joe 2:29, Joe 3:1, Zec 8:23, Ne 13:15, though [[בַּיׇּמִים הָהֵם]] is much more common)

definitions.title: pron. 3 pl. masc.
definitions.body: ([[הֵמָּה]] used incorrectly for the fem. Zec 5:10, Ru 1:22, Ct So 6:8),

definitions.title: fem.
definitions.body: [[הֵ֫נָּה]] [NH also [[הֵן]], which occurs however in Bibl. Heb. only after a prefix: v. infr.

definitions.title: pr. 3 pl.
definitions.body: they (BAram. [[הִמּוֹ]], q.v.; humo, hun-=a; Eth. (one form) 0muntu:: 0m4nti:: ’emūn-tū, emān-tū; cf. also for the dissyl. form, the sf. -ōmū [fem. -ōn]; perh. also As. suff šunu, šina [ni], cf. reff. sub [[הוּא]]). In usage not different in genl. from [[הוּא]], [[הִיא]] (which see, under the corresponding headings, for fuller explanations), thus: —

definitions.title: 1. a.
definitions.body: Ge 6:4, Ex 5:7 [[הֵוּ יֵֽלְכוּ]] let them (emph.) go and gather straw, Nu 31:16, Is 24:14, Ho 4:14, Ho 7:3 etc.; after [[כִּי]] Je 5:5, Je 34:7. (For the use in circumst. clauses v. Dr:§ 160, 169.)

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: Ex 18:22 every small matter [[יִשְׁפְּטוּ־הֵם]] let them judge themselves, v:Ex 18:26, Je 15:19, Je 17:18, Ps 109:28; Es 9:1.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: Ge 33:6, Ge 44:3, Jud 6:5 etc.

definitions.title: 2. a.
definitions.body: (Resuming the subj. with emph.) Ge 14:24 (note accents), De 1:39, Ps 23:4, Ps 27:2 (accents), Ps 37:9, Ps 107:24, Ez Eze 36:7, Eze 44:15.

definitions.title: 3. a.
definitions.body: Ge 3:7, Ex 5:8 [[כִּי נִרְפִּים הֵם]] for they are idle, Ex 14:3, Ex 15:23, Ex 29:33 etc. (the opp. order rare: Nu 11:16, Is 61:9, cf. De:Ps 94:11).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: Ge 34:21, Ge 34:23, Ge 41:26, Ge 48:5 [[לִי הֵם]]…[[שׁני בניך ]] thy two sons…, they are mine, Ex 32:16 + oft.: Is 41:22 [[הָרִאשׁׂנוֹת מָה הֵנָּה]], Is 49:21 [[אֵלֶּה אֵיפׂה הֵם]] these—where were they? Zep 2:12 after [[אַתֶּם]], peculiarly (cf. Dr:§ 198 Obs. 2).

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: De 20:15 [[אֲשֶׁר לאׁ־מֵעָרֵי הַגּׂויִם הָאֵלֶּה הֵנָּה]], Ju Jdg 19:12, 1Ki 9:20.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: 2Ki 7:10 [[כַּאֲשֶׁר הֵמָּה]]. (Pr 19:7 Kt [[לאׁ־הֵמָּה]] is prob. corrupt: v. Comm.)

definitions.title: 4. a.
definitions.body: Pr 30:24 [[אַרְבָּעָה הֵם קְטַנֵּי־אָָרֶץ]] four things are they, the little ones of the earth, v:Pr 30:29 (cf. before a rel. clause v:Pr 30:15, v:Pr 30:18, Pr 6:16) Ct So 6:8, Is 51:19 [[שְׁתַּיִם הֵנָּה קׁרְאׂתַיִךְ]], 1Ch 9:26 (v. [[הוא]]

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: (b) Ge 21:29 …[[מָה הֵנׇּה שֶׁבַע]] lit. What are they—these seven sheep? Zec 1:9, Zec 4:5. (g) …[[אֵלֶּה]] [[הֵם]] † Ge 25:16 (= 1Ch 1:36) Le 23:2, Nu 3:20, Nu 3:21, Nu 3:27, Nu 3:33, 1Sa 4:8, 1Ch 8:6, 1Ch 12:15 (v. Dr: § 201, 3).

definitions.title: 6. a.
definitions.body: In a neuter sense (rare), Job 6:7 [[הֵמָּה]] [[כִּדְוֵי לַחמִי]] they (i.e. such sufferings as mine) are as loathsomeness in my meat, Je 7:4 ´[[הֵיכַל י]] [[הֵמָּה]] they (i.e. these buildings) are the temple of ´[[י]]; and in the fem., Le 5:22 of all that a man doeth to sin [[בָּהֵנׇּה]] therein, 1Ch 21:10 [[מֵהֵנׇּה]] (‖ 2Sa 24:12 [[מֵהֶם]]); 2Sa 12:8, Job 23:14 [[כָּהֵנׇּה]] things such as these.

definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: N.B.—Ez Eze 8:6 Kt [[מָהֵם]] stands for [[מָה הֵם]] (so Qr), cf. [[מַוֶּה]] for [[מַה־וֶּה]] Ex 4:2; 2Ki 9:18 [[עַד־הֵם]] is irreg. for [[עֲדֵיהֶם]]; 2Sa 4:6 ´[[וְהֵנׇּה וג]] is textual error for ´[[וְהִנֵּה שׁׂעֶרֶת הַבַּיִת סׂקְלָה חִטִּים וג]] v. We Dr (LXX & RVm).
With preps. (in lieu of the normal, and more usual, forms with suffixes [[בָּהֶם]], [[לָהֶם]], [[מֵהֶם]] etc. [[[כָּהֶם]] & [[כָּהֶן]], however, each once only, [[כְּמוֹהֶם]] thrice: v. [[בְּ]]])—

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: [[כָּהֵם]] † 2Sa 24:3 Yahweh add to the people [[כָּהֵם וְכָהֵם מֵאָה]] [[פְעָמִים]] the like of themselves and the like of themselves 100 times, = 1Ch 21:3 (but [[כָּהֵם]] here only once, cf. De 1:11 [[בָּכֶם]]), 2Ch 9:11, Ec 9:12.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: [[בָּהֵן]] † Ge 19:29 (P) Ge 30:26, Ge 30:37, Ex 25:29, Ex 37:16 (both P) Le 10:1, Le 11:21, Le 14:40, Nu 10:3, Nu 16:7 (all P) De 28:52, Je 4:29, Je 48:9, Je 51:43, Je 51:43 ([[בָּהֶן]] thrice only, v.p. 88); [[כָּהֵן]] † Ez Eze 18:14 (edd.; Baer [[כָּהֶן]]); [[לָהֵן]] ( = therefore) † Ru 1:13, Ru 1:13 (also BAram.); [[מֵהֵן]] † Ez Eze 16:47, Eze 16:52 (edd.; Baer [[מֵהֶן]]). With the exception of [[כָּחֵנׇּה]], these forms are found mostly in P and writers not earlier than Je.;
